3019.verse: وَلَا|And (do) not|105|139|25$تُخْزِنِى|disgrace me|99|167|12975$يَوْمَ|(on the) Day|105|173|1057$يُبْعَثُونَ|they are resurrected,|162|196|6277$

3024.verse: وَقِيلَ|And it will be said|136|150|3478$لَهُمْ|to them,|77|105|98$أَيْنَ|"Where|67|95|5492$مَا|(is) that|75|103|262$كُنتُمْ|you used|80|108|214$تَعْبُدُونَ|(to) worship|101|115|1216$

3026.verse: فَكُبْكِبُواْ|Then they will be overturned|211|246|12986$فِيهَا|into it,|64|135|253$هُمْ|they|50|121|49$وَٱلْغَاوُۥنَ|and the deviators|137|172|12987$

3030.verse: إِذْ|When|57|98|1198$نُسَوِّيكُم|we equated you|127|209|12989$بِرَبِّ|with (the) Lord|120|202|6704$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|(of) the worlds.|124|165|8$

3036.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|112|713$رَبَّكَ|your Lord,|87|116|586$لَهُوَ|surely He|81|110|2957$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(is) the All-Mighty,|145|174|1187$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful.|140|154|398$

3043.verse: ۞ قَالُوٓاْ|They said,|108|121|101$أَنُؤْمِنُ|"Should we believe|144|170|113$لَكَ|in you|60|86|323$وَٱتَّبَعَكَ|while followed you|141|168|12996$ٱلْأَرْذَلُونَ|the lowest?"|106|119|12997$

3016.verse: And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations.

3017.verse: And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure.

3018.verse: And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.

3019.verse: And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected -

3020.verse: The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children

3021.verse: But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart."

3022.verse: And Paradise will be brought near [that Day] to the righteous.

3023.verse: And Hellfire will be brought forth for the deviators,

3024.verse: And it will be said to them, "Where are those you used to worship

3025.verse: Other than Allah? Can they help you or help themselves?"

3026.verse: So they will be overturned into Hellfire, they and the deviators

3027.verse: And the soldiers of Iblees, all together.

3028.verse: They will say while they dispute therein,

3029.verse: "By Allah, we were indeed in manifest error

3030.verse: When we equated you with the Lord of the worlds.

3031.verse: And no one misguided us except the criminals.

3032.verse: So now we have no intercessors

3034.verse: Then if we only had a return [to the world] and could be of the believers... "

3035.verse: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

3036.verse: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

3037.verse: The people of Noah denied the messengers

3038.verse: When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?

3039.verse: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

3040.verse: So fear Allah and obey me.

3041.verse: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

3042.verse: So fear Allah and obey me."

3043.verse: They said, "Should we believe you while you are followed by the lowest [class of people]?"
